title: Remove “List Your Lease” CTA from Home page

requirements.summary: Remove the "List Your Lease" hero call-to-action from the Landing page while keeping remaining hero CTA alignment responsive and leaving all other routes unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx), the hero CTA row no longer contains a button/link with the label "List Your Lease".
The remaining hero CTA(s) (e.g., "Browse Available Leases") remain visually aligned and responsive on mobile and desktop.
No other pages/routes are removed or changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the hero CTA row to remove the secondary Button/Link that navigates to "/dashboard" with label "List Your Lease". Keep the remaining CTA(s) using the existing shadcn-ui Button component for consistent styling and ensure the flex layout remains centered/aligned across breakpoints after removing one item. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
